jzombies.defender.condition

Class HttpParamLengthCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • jzombies.defender.condition.SubCondition
      • jzombies.defender.condition.HttpParamLengthCheck

  • public class HttpParamLengthCheck
extends SubCondition
    This Class will check the length of the parameter(s) in a http request if they are less or greater or equals to a certain length
